channel.title: GBPK Revamped || Spawn PK || Join in and PK!
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=6]GamblePK - SpawnPK[/SIZE][/CENTER]
Website - [url=http://gamblepk.com]GamblePK - RSPS[/url] Direct Client Download[URL=http://"http://gamblepk.com.mandrake.arvixe.com/webclient/client.jar"]http://gamblepk.com.mandrake.arvixe.com/webclient/client.jar[/URL]
[B][SIZE=3]614+ Anims and Completely Rewritten Combat[/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/imxUYdB.png[/img]
[SIZE=3][B]Sophisticated Achievement System, along with 100% Completionist Cape (there are more req's than this)[/B][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kOvmQw9.png[/img]
[SIZE=3][B]Spawn in with a bank READY TO PK. There are more items such as barrows, too lazy to take another picture ;)[/B][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mqQpUyF.png[/img]
[B][SIZE=3]Many cool features of clan chat, full rank system, clan chat dicing, and lootshare![/SIZE][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f8Bntl0.png[/img]
[SIZE=3][B]Website Preview[/B][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Dy2kCtA.png[/img]
[SIZE=3][B]PKP Shop[/B][/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Q33mxHi.png[/img]
Join us today, we're looking for staff and devs! I am Cam, the main developer, and I welcome you to GamblePK!
Website - [url=http://gamblepk.com]GamblePK - RSPS[/url] Direct Client Download[URL=http://"http://gamblepk.com.mandrake.arvixe.com/webclient/client.jar"]http://gamblepk.com.mandrake.arvixe.com/webclient/client.jar[/URL]
